name: Step Up Software
tagline: App Dev for Smartphone, Digital Pen & the Web.
description:
Application Development for Smartphone, Digital Pen and the Web
Step Up Software build enterprise applications using Anoto Digital Pen.
We do bespoke mobile app development on iPhone, iPad, Android and Blackberry.
We build client server applications, such as Content Management Systems (CMS) or bespoke applications using a variety of different tools (.Net, Java, Ruby, PHP)
We encapsulate all of our development expertise into our own Software as a Service (Saas) product called Step Up Forms. Step Up Forms facilitates data capture in the field using your own forms deployed on a smartphone or on a digital paper form.
READ MORE...

locations.address: Crowthorne Enterprise Centre, Old Wokingham Road
